Divine Resistance.name: Divine Resistance
Divine Resistance.flavor: Summoning the divine spark within you, you shrug off what might have been a debilitating effect.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: An attack applies an effect to you that a save can end  Effect: Make a saving throw against the triggering effect.
Divine Resistance.trigger: An attack applies an effect to you that a save can end
Divine Resistance.effect: Make a saving throw against the triggering effect.
